text: 26.24 Ais 53, Dan 9.26, Mak 9.12, Jon 17.12 Buk Baybol ak bɨlel agɨl tɨkɨlak tek, Bɨ Olap Ñɨne chen gɨ dad amɨl, paklek kumnɨgab agak. Bɨ anɨb ak pen, ne Bɨ Olap Ñɨne nop chen gɨ dad amnɨgab ak, ne tɨtay dɨnɨgab agak. Nonɨm nop ma tɨkɨpɨkop ak, tep yɨbɨl agak. Pen nop tɨkek, yul awl yɨbɨl ak dɨnɨgab agak.
